participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Playful and imaginative, loves to engage in make-believe games.
participant_1.background: my best friend lives next door. i've a pet turtle. i don't pick up my toys. i like to play with my dolls. i am four.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Active and nurturing, enjoys outdoor activities and is passionate about sports.
participant_2.background: my family is continuously growing. i'm married to a doctor. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm a professional tennis player. i live in a three storey house.
